news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Allume Energy has partnered with Arkana Energy, which has joined Allume's SolShare Premier Partner Program. Additionally, Allume Energy was co-founded to bring clean and cost-saving solar power to underserved apartments and affordable housing.

overview_description.description: Allume Energy is a renewable technology company unlocking rooftop solar for the multidwelling market. Allume has invented the world's first hardware solution for solar on multifamily housing and apartments. The SolShare allows one rooftop solar installation to be shared by multiple residents in the one building. It is demand responsive to maximise benefits to residents, and reduce exports of solar to the grid. Allume has installed SolShares in Australia, the United States and the United Kingdom.

properties.growth_insight_description: Allume Energy may be growing as it is featured in discussions and lists highlighting significant players in the renewable energy sector. The company's inclusion in an interview focused on 'Solar for All' suggests recognition of its role and potential influence in the solar industry. Additionally, being listed as one of the '5 Solar Companies in Melbourne to Know' indicates a level of prominence and relevance in the local market. The mention in an article about the green economy and net zero goals, specifically in the context of solar energy, further implies that Allume Energy is part of important conversations around sustainable energy solutions.

about_short_description.short_description: Allume Energy is a renewable energy technology company unlocking solar in the multi-tenanted market.

product.name: SolShare
product.description: A hardware device that splits energy from a single rooftop solar system to multiple dwellings, optimizing solar sharing to maximize savings.

product.name: SolCentre
product.description: Software for monitoring solar delivery and grid electricity usage, providing landlords control over solar distribution and supports billing.
